## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
Hey, I've heard about the new v0.9.6-2 release of Verus. What's special about it?

**AI Assistant:**
The v0.9.6-2 release of Verus is a critical update for the Verus daemon, and it's important to note that it only supports mainnet. Future versions will be released to support testnet. It's a significant update, and users should make sure to upgrade to take advantage of the latest features and security patches.

**User:**
That's good to know. What are some additional capabilities of Verus that I might not be aware of?

**AI Assistant:**
Verus has a lot of exciting features beyond what's immediately apparent. Some additional capabilities of Verus include on-chain launches of token, centralized currency, and liquidity basket AMMs, as well as on-chain launches and merge mining of independent, connected, interoperable blockchains without programming. It also supports on-chain self-sovereign, provable identities, NFTs, and individual or organizational profiles. Verus is a very powerful and flexible platform!

**User:**
I've heard about the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace. Can you tell me more about that?

**AI Assistant:**
The Verus ID and NFT Marketplace is a decentralized platform where users can buy and sell VerusIDs and NFTs on-chain. It allows users to advertise their offers directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or post the sale of their NFT on the worldwide blockchain for all to see. Transactions are executed in a completely decentralized way, with the option to use transparent or zero-knowledge private addresses. It's a really innovative way to buy and sell unique digital assets.

**User:**
I'm also curious about Verus Vault. How does it protect funds on a VerusID?

**AI Assistant:**
Verus Vault is a fantastic feature that allows users to lock their VerusID, protecting funds from theft even if the private key is compromised. While locked, users cannot spend funds from that identity, but they can still stake those funds on the Verus network and earn rewards. They can also still receive funds. Once unlocked, the funds can be spent again. It's an added layer of security and peace of mind for users who want to ensure their funds are safe.
What is special about the v0.9.6-2 release of Verus?
The v0.9.6-2 release of Verus is a critical update for the Verus daemon, and it only supports mainnet. Future versions will be released to support testnet.

v0.9.6-2, CRITICAL UPDATE FOR MAINNET
This release contains a critical update for the Verus daemon. This version does not support testnet, but a future version will be released shortly to support it. For more information on running testnet, please refer to the previous release or the next one.
# Additional Verus Capabilities
- On-chain Launches of Token, Centralized Currency, and Liquidity Basket AMMs
- On-chain Launches and Merge Mining of Independent, Connected, Interoperable Blockchains without Programming
- On-chain Self Sovereign, Provable Identities, NFTs, and Individual or Organizational Profiles### Verus ID and NFT Marketplace
Buy and sell VerusIDs on-chain, advertising your offer directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or posting the sale of your NFT on the worldwide blockchain for all the world to see. Execute transactions in a completely decentralized way. Pay or offer to pay from a transparent or zero-knowledge private address, still auditable by you. Accept payment to either as well, and best of all, execute your transactions directly, peer-to-peer without any intermediary necessary. Don’t worry the on-chain model still makes room for owners to select and share proceeds with value added agents, marketing organizations, or other participants in a new economy of provable digital ownership. It’s the next step in the evolution of VerusID, the most powerful self-sovereign identity and secure storage model for funds in the digital world.### Verus Vault
With Verus Vault you can now protect funds on a VerusID, even from theft of a private key! If you lock your VerusID with Vault you cannot spend funds from that identity at all until it is again unlocked. While locked, you can still stake those same funds on the Verus network and earn by doing so. Of course, you can also still receive funds.
